title: 'Immigrant Magazine' Gives Voice To A Range Of Communities
teaser: When Pamela Anchang moved to the United States from Cameroon, she didn't see stories like hers in the media. So she founded Immigrant Magazine to feature stories from various immigrant communities.
contentencoded:
When Pamela Anchang moved to the United States from Cameroon, she felt that there was a void in the media â€” she didn't see herself. And magazines or newspapers that targeted specific immigrant groups weren't read outside of those small communities.

So she founded Immigrant Magazine to provide a bridge to those different communities with stories from a wide range of perspectives.
